text: Quentin Matsys (other spellings: Massijs, Matsijs, Metsys for the last name; Quinten or Kwinten for the given name) was a Dutch painter. He was born around 1466 in Leuven. He died in 1530 in Antwerp. Category:1460s births Category:1530 deaths Category:Dutch painters Category:People from Leuven
title: Quentin Matsys
